Method Detail

initialize

public void initialize()
Description copied from class: AbstractPage
Method invoked from the constructor, and from AbstractPage.detach() to (re-)initialize properties of the page. This is most useful when properties have non-null initial values.

Subclasses may override this implementation (which is empty).
